description: This file defines the root layout component for a Remix-run based web application, including link tags for stylesheets and external resources, the main layout structure, and the default app component that renders child routes.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines stylesheet and font preconnect links for external resources.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Main layout component wrapping the application's content with HTML structure and meta tags.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Default export component rendering the Outlet for nested routes in Remix.
